'''''Long John Silver''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to check all marked spots during ''[[Rinzou's Treasure]].''

==Trivia==
* The name "Long John Silver" is a reference to the main antagonist Long John Silver of the novel ''{{w|Treasure Island}}'' by {{w|Robert Louis Stevenson}}.
